short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A The_Donald reddit extension to cure symptoms of carpal tunnel due to repeated uptrumps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that one-click upvotes all visible posts on the "The_Donald" subreddit.

Simply load the post listings for "hot", "new", "rising", etc. and the Very Stable Genius will turn from grey to color.

Click him and a small popup below will guide you to start the UpTrumping.

Watch the orange arrows light up and spend more time commenting before Spez bans you for wrong-think.

This extension *does not* require permissions to personal information, no ads, no tracking, no outside requests, no nothing. It clicks buttons so you don't have to.

Note: this only works for The_Donald subreddit.
